setting.location: Private bedroom, man alone with haunting memories surfacing
setting.weather: Cold winter night, frost patterns on windows

characters.appearance: Middle-aged man, 40s, sitting on edge of bed, bare torso showing old scars, hands examining frostbite damage on fingers
characters.clothing: White nightshirt, dark trousers, bare feet on cold floor
characters.position: Sitting hunched forward, head in scarred hands, shoulders bearing weight of traumatic memories
characters.action: Staring at permanently damaged hands from Siberian cold, reliving past suffering that shaped his character

scene.mainElements: Sparse bedroom with single bed, small table with oil lamp casting flickering shadows, mirror reflecting haunted face
scene.details: Hands showing permanent discoloration and scarring from severe frostbite, room cold enough to see breath, shadows on walls suggesting prison bars from memory, personal effects including old military medal from uprising, photographs of comrades who didn't survive, empty vodka bottle suggesting attempt to numb pain
scene.background: Window showing winter night similar to Siberian landscape of memory, crucifix on wall, few books including poetry that sustained him during imprisonment
scene.atmosphere: Private moment of vulnerability revealing psychological wounds beneath successful exterior, weight of survivor guilt and traumatic memories, connection between past suffering and present obsessive drive, no text or letters visible

composition.cameraAngle: Close-up shot focusing on damaged hands and tormented expression
composition.focus: Physical evidence of past trauma still affecting present life
composition.depth: Foreground: scarred hands, middle: man's anguished face, background: shadowy room suggesting prison memories
